text: Her uncleanness contaminates her skirts.1:9. Referring to the uncleanness resulting from unfaithfulness (see Leviticus 18:20 for example). She didn't think about what would happen. Her fall was a shock, and no one was there to comfort her. “Please, Lord, see how much I'm suffering, because the enemy has won!” she says.1:9. “She says”: added for clarity.
